mapper.select: SELECT u.headimg ,u.id as acceptId ,u.nickname as acceptName, count(u.id) as acceptCount,u.sign FROM t_app_user u INNER JOIN t_csp_delivery d ON d.accept_id = u.id WHERE d.author_id = #{authorId} GROUP BY u.id

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.play_type,sum(cd2.duration) as duration, COUNT(cd2.id) AS pageCount,l.start_time, l.end_time, cd.img_url as cover_url FROM t_audio_course c LEFT JOIN t_csp_live l ON l.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_audio_course_detail cd ON c.id = cd.course_id AND cd.sort = 1 LEFT JOIN t_audio_course_detail cd2 ON c.id = cd2.course_id INNER JOIN t_csp_delivery d ON d.source_id = c.id WHERE d.accept_id = #{acceptId} AND d.author_id = #{authorId} GROUP BY c.id
SELECT u.id, u.nickname, u.sign as info, u.headimg as avatar FROM t_app_user u INNER JOIN t_app_user_detail ud ON u.id = ud.user_id AND u.pub_flag = true AND ud.delivery_flag = true
